caption.title: in vivo validation of the biological properties of the IC virus in resistant mice.
caption.p: Groups of 5 adult female or male outbred MBT/Pas, congenic C.MBT-Oas1b or BALB/c mice were injected i.p. with 1000 PFU of parental (P) or recombinant (IC) IS-98-ST1 virus. The mice were monitored for 15 days p.i. (a) Survival curves and (b) viral RNA copy number in blood of mice 3 days p.i. * shows significant differences between groups. ns: not significant.
